meanings.definition: The part of the body of a vertebrate containing the digestive organs; the belly.
meanings.sent1: She gently patted her baby's soft abdomens after feeding.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pressed on the patient's abdomens to check for any tenderness.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's playful swats at its own abdomens during a nap made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His love for desserts seemed to go straight to his abdomens, expanding his waistline.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's shimmering costume accentuated her toned abdomens under the stage lights.
